definition: the whole family/the same family/the family ... (when preceded by a family name)/group
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
to have a style of one's own
people who don't belong together, don't get to live together (idiom)/marriages are predestined/people marry because they share common traits
pinyin: bu4 shi4 yi1 jia1 ren2 bu4 jin4 yi1 jia1 men2
containing_words.word: 不是一家人不进一家门

definition: people who don't belong together, don't get to live together (idiom)/marriages are predestined/people marry because they share common traits
pinyin: bu4 shi4 yi1 jia1 ren2 bu4 jin4 yi1 jia1 men2
containing_words.word: 不是一家人不进一家门

definition: five hundred years ago we were the same family (idiom) (said of persons with the same surname)
pinyin: wu3 bai3 nian2 qian2 shi4 yi1 jia1

sentences.english: The Browns are all college graduates.
sentences.chinese: 布朗一家人都是大学毕业生。

sentences.english: I met her in a bar.
sentences.chinese: 我在一家酒吧遇到的她。

sentences.english: The book was out of print, but I eventually ran it to earth at a secondhand bookshop.
sentences.chinese: 那本书已经绝版，但我终于在一家旧书店淘到了它。

sentences.english: Some years ago, a good family moved into the third floor apartment of the tenement where we lived in the Bronx.
sentences.chinese: 多年前，我们住在布朗克斯时，三楼搬来一家新租户。

sentences.english: Look, Dashan. There's a service station straight ahead.
sentences.chinese: 大山，你看，前边有一家加油站。

sentences.english: Another company I follow is Pediment Gold.
sentences.chinese: 另一家公司是山花我遵循黄金。

sentences.english: I also worked at an insurance company for my graduate field work.
sentences.chinese: 并且我在一家保险公司进行了我的毕业设计。

sentences.english: The last was opened in Dalian in Liaoning province in February this year.
sentences.chinese: 最近的一家去年二月在辽宁大连开张。

sentences.english: The Hendersons seldom go to church, but they believe.
sentences.chinese: 亨德森一家很少去教堂做礼拜，但他们笃信宗教。

sentences.english: The Passion is a high-end club in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 天上人间是北京一家高端会所。

sentences.english: The gift can be something made or bought from a gift shop.
sentences.chinese: 能很轻松的礼物或买一家礼品店。

sentences.english: For example, we have built a dental clinic in Swaziland, Africa.
sentences.chinese: 例如，我们已经在非洲斯威士兰建立了一家牙科诊所。

sentences.english: This outsider was fleeced when he was shopping in a local shop.
sentences.chinese: 这个外地人在当地的一家商店购物时挨宰了。

sentences.english: Q. Is the house the Cullens live in real?
sentences.chinese: 卡伦一家住的房子是有实体的吗？

sentences.english: You have one where you have almost only pirates in there.
sentences.chinese: 有一家只招待海盗的酒吧。

sentences.english: A fresh meat store recently opened in the food market.
sentences.chinese: 菜场新开了一家专卖冷鲜肉的店铺。

definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
to engage in (business etc)/to run/to operate
Six schools of pre-Han philosophy, as analyzed by 司馬談|司马谈[Si1 ma3 Tan2] (儒家[Ru2 jia1], 道家[Dao4 jia1], 陰陽|阴阳[yin1 yang2], 法家[Fa3 jia1], 名家[Ming2 jia1], and 墨家[Mo4 jia1])
